site.description: RAB Homes Ng Ltd is a premium real estate company based in Abuja, Nigeria. We specialize in ultra-luxury residences that emphasize exclusivity, craftsmanship, and superior amenities.

team.name: Rabiu Usman
team.bio: Company founder and principal, focused on high-end property curation.
